sentences.en: Even witches appreciate what they bring to a boiling cauldron.
sentences.cn: 就连女巫也爱欣赏她们手底冒着气泡的大锅.

sentences.en: First let's add a little more to our magical cauldron.
sentences.cn: 首先让我们再加点东西到魔术锅里.

sentences.en: He ran over to a neighbour's house to borrow a cauldron.
sentences.cn: 他匆匆到邻居家去借一口大锅.

sentences.en: Let us look into this witches'cauldron.
sentences.cn: 让我们来看看这可怕的不混乱状态.

sentences.en: On top of this earthen structure stood a deep, round, iron cauldron.
sentences.cn: 在这土灶的上面,墩着一口又圆又深的大铁锅.

sentences.en: Paavo Nurmi lit the Olympic flame in a cauldron on the field.
sentences.cn: 4名年轻的运动员将火炬传到体育场塔顶,最后由汉内斯·科莱赫迈宁点燃圣火.

sentences.en: Several men were thrown into a boiling cauldron.
sentences.cn: 几个人被扔进滚水锅中.

sentences.en: She lit the tallest - ever Olympic cauldron , which rises to 57 meters.
sentences.cn: 她点燃了有史以来最高的奥运火炉.

sentences.en: Supplies you will need: two black candles, cauldron, paper and pen.
sentences.cn: 你将需要: 两个黑色蜡烛 、 大锅 、 纸和笔.

sentences.en: The bombing of Cambodia or covert operations in Chile were thrown into the cauldron.
sentences.cn: 轰炸柬埔寨和在智利的秘密行动也被拿来试问.

sentences.en: The earthenware which appears together with the ashes concluded initially is cauldron which the life uses.
sentences.cn: 与灰烬一道出现的陶器初步断定是生活用的釜.

sentences.en: The stadium was a seething cauldron of emotion.
Then the witch placed her cauldron on the fire, to prepare the magic draught.
sentences.cn: “就这样办吧.”小人鱼说. 巫婆于是就把药罐准备好,来煎这服富有魔力的药了.

sentences.en: They used the method of removing the burning brands from under the boiling cauldron.
sentences.cn: 他们使用了釜底抽薪的办法.

sentences.en: Your symbols are the athame, torch, scourge, key and the cauldron.
sentences.cn: 匕首 、 火炬 、 鞭子 、 钥匙与斧子是您的象征.

trans.tran_cn: 大锅，大汽锅，煮皂锅，海釜
trans.tran_en: a large round metal pot for boiling liquids over a fire
